  • Method Details

    • execute

      public String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Class execute method. First the AP of the targeted pokemon is recorded, If the AP is lower than the requirements, the pokemon is not caught and the AP of the pokemon is reduced. If the AP is high enough, a Pokeball instance is made and the target pokemon is assigned to the Pokeball. The target pokemon is removed from the map and candy is spawned in the place where the target was.
      Specified by:
      execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      map - The map the actor is on.
      Returns:
      string literal denoting the pokemon is caught if the conditions are met, or string literal denoting the pokemon is not caught if
